result.markdown:
---
title: "Installation"
author: "Zihan Zhu, Yiqian Zhang, Wenhao Li and Liangliang Zhang"
date: "2025-06-10"
categories: [news]
---
To install the development version of Betadiag from GitHub:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Install devtools if not already installed
# install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Loading required package: usethis
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
devtools::install_github("bioscinema/Betadiag")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Skipping install of 'Betadiag' from a github remote, the SHA1 (fabfe08b) has not changed since last install.
  Use `force = TRUE` to force installation
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(Betadiag)
```
:::


You can also use Betadiag through our web-based Shiny app.
Simply upload or paste your distance matrix and metadata to run diagnostics directly in your browser â€” no installation needed, and no data is saved.
